actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: To provide certain uninsured individuals a special enrollment period after tax filing in 2015 for enrollment in qualified health plans offered through an Exchange, and for other purposes.
short_title: Get Your Refund, Get Your Health Care Act

titles.title: Get Your Refund, Get Your Health Care Act
To provide certain uninsured individuals a special enrollment period after tax filing in 2015 for enrollment in qualified health plans offered through an Exchange, and for other purposes.
